name: thirteen05 creative
description: Thirteen05 creative Â harbor creativity and innovation while trying to not let the everyday bureaucracy of bigger businesses impede on us having a comfortable and fun work environment. The bottom line is: we like to work and we like to play and sometimes we figure out a way to do both at the same time.
